Description:
The ritual ended, the room filled with red smoke, and the temperature rose rapidly. You don't know if it went well or not, but all the remaining cultists start to flee in panic after realizing what they've done.

An impressive imp appears before you, that is a greater demon, Belphyor, the Lord of the Imps.

(Belphyor) "What do you want from me, mortal?"
DescriptionAction: Although weakened by the precarious summoning conditions, you can't underestimate him.

    "SSDustReward": 0,

    "SSExperienceReward": 22,

    "SSFinishObeliskMap": false,

    "SSRequirementUnlock": "belphyorscroll",
    "SSRequirementUnlock2": "belphyorquest",
    "SSRewardHealthFlat": 0,
    "SSRewardHealthPercent": 0.0,
    "SSRewardText": "(Belphyor) \"I see you're still alive.... And you dare to call me old friend? Last time... you summoned me into the depths of that damned forge and then abandoned me to my fate. You owe me one and now is the perfect time to repay me.\n\nYour former followers are using my imps as mere tools... they've had enough and now they're out for revenge. Take this scroll and use it in a place full of cultists.\n\nDo this for me and we'll be even, plus I'll reward you generously.\"",
